RelatedSentence: The Supreme Court on Monday granted three weeks ' interim bail to Tehelka founder - editor Tarun Tejpal so that he could perform last rites of his mother , who passed away in Goa on Sunday .
The Supreme Court on Monday granted three weeks ' interim bail to Tehelka founder - editor Tarun Tejpal so that he could perform last rites of his mother , who passed away in Goa on Sunday .
The apex court bench of Justice B.S. Chauhan and Justice A.K. Sikri passed the orders granting Mr. Tejpal interim bail after holding the hearing on his plea in their chamber .
A former junior woman colleague last year accused Mr. Tejpal of rape during ThinkFest , a high - profile conference organised by the Tehelka founder in Goa .
